fields.request: Manual QA: Ensure upgrade.sh syncs dependencies and migrations
fields.request_details: In a node with an existing installation, modify requirements.txt (for example add a new dependency) and create a schema migration. Run ./upgrade.sh --no-restart and confirm it upgrades pip, reinstalls requirements when the hash changes, applies the pending migrations, and reloads optional data/*.json fixtures without errors. Restore the requirements file afterwards.
